inscription:
Eika poem on the upper right corner
Decorum;
If you are loyal to your lord
And dutiful to your parents
Never angry
Always polite
Your life will be wonderful
(Rei; 
Kimi wo omoi
Oya ni ko_ ari
Ikari naku
Reigi wo tsukusu
Hito zo tanoshiki)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Five Cardinal Virtues (Go-jō 五常)
provenance: Frederick S. Colburn; Richard P. Gale (until 1974)
title: Decorum
